tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE artwork (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    artist VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    availability BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE artworks (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  artist VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  availability BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Artworks (
  artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artwork_name VARCHAR(255),
  artist_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  availability BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Artists (
  artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_name VARCHAR(255),
  nationality VARCHAR(255),
  birth_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE Galleries (
  gallery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gallery_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  floor_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE Artwork (
	artwork_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	title VARCHAR(255),
	author VARCHAR(255),
	location VARCHAR(100),
	available BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE ArtworkLocation (
	location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	artwork_id INTEGER REFERENCES Artwork(artwork_id),
	gallery_id INTEGER REFERENCES Gallery(gallery_id),
	floor INTEGER,
	position INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE Artwork (
    artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    artist VARCHAR(255),
    year INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    availability BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Gallery (
    gallery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    opening_hours VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE ArtworkLocation (
    artwork_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (artwork_id) REFERENCES Artwork(artwork_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES Gallery(gallery_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ArtworkSale (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_id INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    sale_date DATE,
    seller VARCHAR(255),
    buyer VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (artwork_id) REFERENCES Artwork(artwork_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ArtworkHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_id INT,
    event_description TEXT,
    event_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (artwork_id) REFERENCES Artwork(artwork_id)
)
